thread.title: Griffin scores 22, Clippers down Trail Blazers 115-109
thread.title_full: Griffin scores 22, Clippers down Trail Blazers 115-109

author: The Associated Press
title: Griffin scores 22, Clippers down Trail Blazers 115-109
text: Griffin scores 22, Clippers down Trail Blazers 115-109 The Associated Press Print this article Advertisement LOS ANGELES — Blake Griffin scored 22 points and Paul Pierce had 19 as the Los Angeles Clippers defeated the Portland Trail Blazers 115-109 in the preseason finale for both teams on Thursday night. Pierce scored 14 in the fourth quarter and the Clippers came back from 28 points down in the first quarter and an 18-point halftime deficit. J.J. Redick’s 3-pointer tied it at 102. Wesley Johnson followed with a 3-pointer to give the Clippers the lead for good.
